timeline.raw_data: {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-08-20T08:03:31", "sender_email": "makisctl0808@gmail.com", "recipient_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "subject": "Re: Hi Maki, amber is here to help you book your ideal student home in London! Let's go!", "message": "Dear Rishabah,\\nThank you for reaching out.\\nBefore I book this accommodation, I wanted to do a virtual room tour. What days are available during the week?\\n\\nSincerely,\\nMaki\\n\\nOn Wed, Aug 20, 2025 at 17:00 <[rishabh.m@amberstudent.com]()> wrote:\\n\\nHi Maki,\\n\\nWe hope this email finds you well. This is our final call to complete your Student Accommodation Booking. We have reached out to you several times but have not received a response. It's crucial to take immediate action to Secure your Preferred Accommodation.\\n\\nIf you have any questions or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out to us via Call / Email / Whatsapp or let us know a suitable time to contact you. We look forward to your response and the opportunity to assist you further.\\n\\nThank you for considering our services, and we wish you the best for your upcoming academic journey.\\n\\nNote: Please ignore if already in touch.\\n\\nKind regards,\\n\\n[amberstudent.com]\\n\\nRishabh M\\n\\nSenior Operation Associate\\n\\nPhone: [+447460047271]()\\n\\nWhatsapp: [+447460047271]()\\n\\nEmail: [rishabh.m@amberstudent.com]()\\n\\nWebsite: [amberstudent.com]()", "snippet": "Dear Rishabah, Thank you for reaching out. Before I book this accommodation, I wanted to do a virtual room tour. What days are available during the week? Sincerely, Maki On Wed, Aug 20, 2025 at 17:00", "direction": "inbound", "sender_type": "student", "agent_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "student_email": "makisctl0808@gmail.com"}

transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Hello. Yeah Rishabh, this site calling you from Abbas2.
Speaker B: Sorry, I can't hear you.
Speaker A: Yeah, hello. Am I speaking with Mackie here? Yes, Mackie. Rishabh, just like calling you from Ambit Student.
Speaker B: Who is this?
Speaker A: Ambit Mackie, the call is regarding the student accommodation.
Speaker B: Oh yes, I had a question about the twin ensuite room. I had a question about the twin. Twin room?
Speaker A: Yeah. Please tell me what is the question?
Speaker B: So if I want to book that twin room do I have to search for a roommate myself?
Speaker A: Let me check. No, you don't have to search the roommate by yourself.
Speaker B: So I'll be paired up by the accommodation, right?
Speaker A: Absolutely.
Speaker B: Okay, thank you.
Speaker A: So should I proceed ahead with the application now?
Speaker B: Yes.
Speaker A: So I will do one thing here. I'll share you a booking form over your WhatsApp. I hope this number is on WhatsApp.
Speaker B: Wait, sorry, I think my connection is really bad. Can I call you later?
Speaker A: I'll connect you on WhatsApp. Okay.
Speaker B: Okay, thank you.

Speaker A: Hello? Yeah, hello, am I speaking with Mackie here? Sorry, am I speaking with Mackie here? Mackie. Cy. Yes, hello. Mikey Rush up the slide, calling you from Amazon. This call was regarding your student accommodation. Yes, I can see that you have filled. You are interested in one property that is Kelsey Light football, am I correct? So it's a little hard to hear with the background noise, is it? Fine if I connect you one WhatsApp, then. Okay, I'll connect you on WhatsApp.
